name: explore-graphql
author: Rob Brennan <rob@therobbrennan.com> (therobbrennan.com)
description: A starting point to explore GraphQL

scripts.docker:nuke: npm run docker:nuke:containers && docker rmi -f $(docker images -q)
scripts.docker:refresh: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up
scripts.docker:refresh:clean: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up:clean
